=== About me ===

I am Janith Sampath Bandara, a 22 years old Sri Lankan Ubuntu user.

I am studying computer science in University of Colombo School of Computing (<nowiki>[[http://www.ucsc.cmb.ac.lk | UCSC ]]</nowiki>). I've been using Linux since 2006 using RedHat and have a wide rangs of interests in Ubuntu (including Bug tracking , user support ,  testing and Localizing). I have desktop Linux experience with RedHat, SUSE, Mandriva, kubuntu and now Ubuntu!

=== Interested Areas ===

I'm a programmer, Designer and interested in C, Java, php/mysql and c#/asp. Also I am familiar with Robotics and embedded system development.
